public ref class RegistrationHelper sealed : MarshalByRefObject, System::EnterpriseServices::IRegistrationHelper
type RegistrationHelper = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IRegistrationHelper

summary.span: 在 COM+ 目录中安装并配置程序集。

span.span: Installs and configures assemblies in the COM+ catalog.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET 服务安装工具 (Regsvcs.exe) 和执行的第一次激活的自动注册步骤使用。 is used by both the .NET Services Installation Tool (Regsvcs.exe) and the automatic registration steps that are performed on first activation of a .

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: RegistrationHelper();

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 提供可用于 COM+ 目录的运行时组件。

span.span: Provides the run-time components available to the COM+ catalog.

MemberSignature.Value: public void InstallAssembly (string assembly, ref string application, ref string tlb, System.EnterpriseServices.InstallationFlags installFlags);

Public Sub InstallAssembly (assembly As String, ByRef application As String, ByRef tlb As String, installFlags As InstallationFlags)

span.span: The file name of the assembly to install.

param.name: application
param.span: 安装到的 COM+ 应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the COM+ application to install into.

param.span: 此参数可以为 。

span.span: This parameter can be .

param.span: 如果参数为 并且程序集包含 ，则使用该特性。

span.span: If the parameter is and the assembly contains a , then the attribute is used.

param.span: 否则，会根据程序集的名称生成应用程序的名称，然后返回应用程序的名称。

span.span: Otherwise, the name of the application is generated based on the name of the assembly, then is returned.

param.name: tlb
param.span: 输出类型库导出程序 (Tlbexp.exe) 文件的名称；如果要求注册帮助器生成该名称，则为包含 的字符串。

span.span: The actual name used is placed in the parameter on call completion.

param.span: 值的按位组合。

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values.

summary.span: 在 COM+ 应用程序中安装命名的程序集。

span.span: Installs the named assembly in a COM+ application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行以下步骤： 注册、 生成类型库，注册类型库，在指定的应用程序，并包含类型库中的组件的配置的类型库的安装。 performs the following steps: registration, generation of a type library, registration of the type library, installation of the type library under the specified application, and configuration of the components contained in the type library. 此方法要求调用方在本地计算机上拥有管理权限。This method requires the caller to have administrative privileges on the local computer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`InstalAssembly`方法来安装 COM + 应用程序中的命名程序集。The following code example shows how to use the `InstalAssembly` method to install a named assembly in a COM+ application. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices Registration#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices Registration/CPP/deployservicedcomponent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices Registration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices Registration/CS/deployservicedcomponent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices Registration#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices Registration/VB/deployservicedcomponent.vb#1)]
